item.description:
The last meetup went so well, we decided to plan another one for September.

Again, I promise that not all Meetups will be held at my house, but until more people contact me about hosting, and until I find out more about available rooms and meeting halls in Salem, we don't have much of a choice.

So, we'll meet up at my house on Friday, September 14 at 8:00. It is 21 Lemon St. and the house is pumpkin colored. There is some parking available on Lemon St. and more parking available on Northey St. (one block closer to the T) and on Cross St. (which tees into Lemon). Plan on coming earlier to find a spot.

Also, just a note again, the house is home to two cats for those who are allergic. For those who aren't allergic but don't like cats, they will be put away for the evening. I apologize for those with allergies, we just need more volunteers to host in their cat-free homes.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: More Board Games
